data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Since having all 100 tiles is crucial to tournament game play, players should confirm that the Scrabble set contains 100 tiles (this is usually done by arranging the tiles into four 5x5 squares, or one 10x10 square). In ____ tournament ____, ____ player ____ the ____ number ____ firsts ____ go ____; ____ there ____ a ____, ____ player ____ the ____ number ____ seconds ____ first. If there is still a tie, both players draw one tile, as described above.
data.partBlankContent: Since having all 100 tiles is crucial to tournament game play, players should confirm that the Scrabble set contains 100 tiles (this is usually done by arranging the tiles into four 5x5 squares, or one 10x10 square). In mo__ tournament ga___, t__ player wi__ the fe___ number o_ firsts wi__ go fi___; i_ there i_ a t__, t__ player wi__ the mo__ number o_ seconds go__ first. If there is still a tie, both players draw one tile, as described above.
data.fullContent: Since having all 100 tiles is crucial to tournament game play, players should confirm that the Scrabble set contains 100 tiles (this is usually done by arranging the tiles into four 5x5 squares, or one 10x10 square). In most tournament games, the player with the fewer number of firsts will go first; if there is a tie, the player with the most number of seconds goes first. If there is still a tie, both players draw one tile, as described above.
data.answer: 因为拥有所有100个贴图对于比赛游戏玩法来说至关重要，所以玩家应该确认Scrabble集合包含100个贴图(游戏邦注:这通常是通过将贴图排列成4个5x5的方块，或1个10x10的方块)。在大多数锦标赛游戏中，先得次数较少的玩家将获得第一;如果出现平局，秒数最多的玩家先走。如果仍然是平局，两名球员都按上面所述的方式抽一张牌。
